div.name: QyM=
div.literal_block: Label label = GetNode<Label>("Label"); Vector2 stringSize = label.GetThemeFont("font").GetStringSize(label.Text, HorizontalAlignment.Left, -1, label.GetThemeFontSize("font_size"));
